name: Reddit Doll maker (WIP)
description:
A doll maker I felt like making, it's for pirating shitty reddit NFT'S!

This project is very work in progress.

I will update every week. (Hopefully.)

Questions

Will this game ever let me out?

Yes, there is an exit button in the editor. If it doesn't work, then press alt f4

Will nikocados burger quest have a sequel after this game is finished?

Probably, it depends if I want to make it.
